name: Squalane + Ectoin Overnight Rescue Deep Repair Night Moisturizer
about: What it is:u00a0An intensive repairing nighttime moisturizer that restores the skinu2019s moisture barrier and smooths dry, rough patches...Skin Type: Normal, Dry, and Combination..Skincare Concerns: Fine Lines and Wrinkles, Dryness, and Loss of Firmness and Elasticity..Formulation: Cream..Highlighted Ingredients:- Ectoin: Is shown to protect skin against damage caused by external aggressors..- Magnesium and Peptides: Support skin restoration and deter daily stressors..- Sugarcane-Derived Squalane: Provides weightless hydration without clogging pores...Ingredient Callouts: This product is vegan, cruelty-free, and comes in recyclable packaging...What Else You Need to Know: This ultra-moisturizing rich cream contains bio-fermented ectoin to bind and lock in moisture and calm reddened skin. Magnesium and peptides support skinu2019s nighttime repair process for optimal overnight restoration to reveal calm, radiant, healthy-looking skin...Clinical Results: In a 28-day consumer study of 33 women (ages 18 to 50):.- 97% saw reduced skin irritation and dryness after 4 weeks..In a 28-day consumer RIPT study of 205 men and women (ages 18 to 55):.- 100% of self-perceived sensitive skin subjects reported no irritation..In a 24-hour clinical study of 33 women (ages 18 to 50):.- It provided an overnight boost of hydration in skin for up to 24 hours..Clean & Planet AwareOur ambitious curation of beauty made without controversial ingredients from brands dedicated to making meaningful environmental commitments,u00a0including sustainable ingredients and sourcing, packaging, corporate commitments, and consumer transparency.
ingredients: -Ectoin: Is shown to protect skin against damage caused by external aggressors..-Magnesium and Peptides: Support skin restoration and deter daily stressors..-Sugarcane-Derived Squalane: Provides weightless hydration without clogging pores....Water, Glycerin, Squalane, Shorea Stenoptera Seed Butter,* Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, C12-16 Alcohols, Sodium Acrylates Copolymer, Ectoin, Jojoba Esters, Palmitic Acid, Phenoxyethanol, Hydrogenated Lecithin, Hydroxyethyl Acrylate/Sodium Acryloyldimethyl Taurate Copolymer, Lecithin, Magnesium Chloride, Ethylhexylglycerin, Sodium Gluconate, Caprylyl Glycol, Acetyl Hexapeptide-8..*Certified Organic...The list of ingredients is subject to change. Please consult the packaging of the product purchased.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Apply to a cleansed face and neck as the final step in your nightly skincare routine...Recycling Instructions:.-Remove and dispose of cap..-Empty and rinse remaining product from jar..-Place in curbside recycling..-The outer carton can be placed in curbside recycling.

reviews.review_text: My go to nightly moisturizer. I love how deeply moisturized my face feels when I wake up after using before bed. A must item for my nightly skincare routine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Biossance please never stop making this. Itu2019s the ultimate night cream. There is nothing better. If it was $200 Iu2019d still buy it

reviews.review_title: A+ for sensitive skin. amazing for dry flaky skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: absolutely love this product. my skin is combo & it really depends what i'm using on my skin how much oil/ dryness it has. i've been using Tower28 SOS spray, serum, & moisturizer & its been working wonders on clearing my minimal but stubborn acne/ clogged pores, but it really dries my skin out. i tried using Inky List Hyaluronic Acid & Innisfree Green Tea Seed Hyaluronic Acid Cream but my skin was still dry & flaky the next morning.  i also have VERY sensitive skin. most products make my skin feel tingly with a mild burning sensation. i'm also allergic to ethylenediamine & parabens so i look for products free from that. i came across Biossance Overnight Repair Cream & wow, heaven. my skin does NOT feel like it burning when i apply it. does not tingle at all. just a super fresh cool gel feeling. i love it. my skin is also not dry & flaky in the morning. i also use this as a daytime moisturizer. it's lightweight & absorbs quickly, does not leave your face looking oily & shiny. a very nice healthy glow.   GET THIS !!
